todos.content: Phase 1: Django project setup with config, apps, and pgvector
Phase 1: Create core models (Organization, User) and API key auth middleware
Phase 1: Document upload API with S3 integration
Phase 2: PDF extraction, chunking, embeddings pipeline
Phase 2: Store chunks in pgvector and track processing status
Phase 4: Complete REST API, rate limiting, docs, tests
Phase 5: JavaScript embeddable widget with Shadow DOM
